channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: IMG Academy downs feisty Venice squad, 27-14
item.description: VENICE — Another valiant effort against an elite program fell short for Venice, which lost its third game of the year in a 27-14 tilt to IMG Academy.

item.title: Herald-Tribune celebrates 100 years of service in Sarasota
item.description: David B. Lindsay, the founding publisher ofthe newspaper that evolved into the Sarasota Herald-Tribune, first set eyes on the nascent city of Sarasota from a World War I era biplane he flew from a military flight training field near Arcadia in 1917.

item.title: Sarasota Memorial Hospital makes Forbes’ list of Best Employers
item.description: Sarasota Memorial Health Care Systemwas recognized in Forbes’ list of America’s Best Employers for Healthcare Professionals for 2025.

item.title: Wavytalk’s viral hair tools are up to 40% off for October Prime Day
item.description: If your hair could use a seasonal refresh, now’s the time to make it shine.Wavytalk, the fast-growing hair tools brandranked #1 on TikTok Shop and an Amazon best-seller, is making waves ahead of October Prime Day with some unbelievable discounts.

item.title: Watch the Cubs face the Brewers in the NLDS on Sling
item.description: The Chicago Cubs are headed to the National League Division Series! The Cubbies sent the San Diego Padres packing with a dominant performance in the decisive Game 3 of the Wild Card Round. Now, they will face MLB's best, the Milwaukee Brewers. The entireNLDS will be available to watch on Sling.

item.title: I found epic deals with up to 72% off outdoor gear for fall 2025
item.description: I love a good fall moment. Just put me in a beanie and hoodie and I'm living my best life. The fall season is not onlythe coziest and most comfortable, but it is a beautiful time to upgrade your outdoor gear for all your adventures! Whether you're an autumn hiker or more of a summer camper, there are October deals to help you upgrade your gear and save on all sorts of essential itemsthis weekend.

item.title: Your guide to the 2025 Sarasota, Manatee high school…
item.description: From preseason practices through the state championship games, theHerald-Tribunewill be covering the high school football season every step of the way.

item.title: Powerball winners will take home millions but not $1.787…
item.description: Can a$2 Powerball lottery ticketmake you a billionaire? So far, no. But at least one person has come close.

item.title: Herald-Tribune midseason football player and coach of…
item.description: High school football in Sarasota and Manatee counties has been one of the best in recent memory this fall.

item.title: Vote for Herald-Tribune's Football Midseason Offensive…
item.description: We have reached the halfway point of the Sarasota-Manatee high school football season. As we head into the second half of the season, we made our picks for thefront runners for Offensive and Defensive Player of the Year.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee counties
item.description: It's the first full week of October, a month that'll bringa stacked events calendarto the Sarasota area, including live music. The biggest show in town this week will be an annual Circus Arts Conservatory fundraiser and electronic dance music concert, once again headlined by an internationally renowned DJ.

item.title: Our children attend Wilkinson Elementary. We will fight to save it.Wilkinson Elementary School parents Guest columnists
item.description: We are parents of children atWilkinson Elementary, and we love our school.

item.title: Sarasota, Manatee high school football scores: Live FHSAA, SSAA updates from Week 7
item.description: We are getting deeper into the high school football season as the calendar flips to October, the final month of the regular season. FHSAA Sarasota and Manatee county schools enter Week 7 play and some SSAA teams are getting ready to play their eighth game.

item.title: Week 7 sees Sarasota win a thriller, while Riverview, Southeast roll
item.description: A roundup of Manatee and Sarasota county high school football games played Friday, Oct. 3, 2025.

item.title: When will Sarasota feel its first cold front?
item.description: Fall may have started on the calendar, butSarasota-Bradentonwon’t feel it for a while. The first cold front isn’t expected until mid-to-late October, and a real cool-down won't arrive until November.
